vehicle.title: Vehicle Damage Claim Details
vehicle.subtitle: Provide details about the accident or damage to your vehicle.
vehicle.tips: Include: date and time of incident, location, other parties involved, police report number if applicable, and description of damage.

property.title: Property Damage Claim Details
property.subtitle: Describe the damage to your property and how it occurred.
property.tips: Include: type of property, cause of damage (fire, water, storm, etc.), extent of damage, and any emergency repairs made.

injury.title: Personal Injury Claim Details
injury.subtitle: Provide information about your injury and medical treatment.
injury.tips: Include: nature of injury, where and how it occurred, medical treatment received, healthcare providers, and ongoing symptoms or limitations.

travel.title: Travel & Flight Claim Details
travel.subtitle: Provide your flight or travel booking information.
travel.tips: Include: booking reference, flight number, departure/arrival airports, scheduled vs actual times, and reason for delay/cancellation if known.

review.title: Review & Submit
review.subtitle: Please check your details before submitting.
